comment._content: The red brick Metropole hotel was built in 1898. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hilton_Brighton_Metropole www.mybrightonandhove.org.uk/page_id__6018.aspx and www.mybrightonandhove.org.uk/page_id__8299_path__0p115p19... The other big hotel (light-colored) is the Grand, built in 1860s. www.mybrightonandhove.org.uk/category_id__833_path__.aspx and www.mybrightonandhove.org.uk/page_id__8139_path__0p115p19...
